name: NIGHT FOX
description:
You are NIGHT FOX! And THE PEOPLE NEED YOU! 

Get those nasty EAGLES and FROGS!! They like to STEAL OUR STUFF! 

Share a SCREENSHOT your HIGH SCORE!

Play this game in the browser above! OR download the Windows version!

For the best experience please use a VIDEOGAME CONTROLLER... but... do not worry! The KEYBOARD works just as good! 

LOVE YOU!!! (   ` o`)
